law.text: Subject to the provisions of KRS 56.440 to 56.550, inclusive, the secretary of the Education and Workforce Development Cabinet is authorized and empowered to use all or any part of the funds accumulated under the provisions of KRS 341.295 for the purpose of acquiring suitable space for either central or district offices of the cabinet by way of purchase, lease, contract, or in any other manner including the right to use said funds or any part thereof to assist in financing the construction of any building erected by the Commonwealth or any of its agencies wherein available space will be provided for the cabinet under lease or contract between the cabinet and the Commonwealth or such other agency whereby said cabinet will continue to occupy such space, rent free, after the cost of financing such building has been liquidated.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 11, sec. 76, effective June 25, 2009. -- Amended 2006 Ky. Acts ch. 211, sec. 141, effective July 12, 2006. -- Amended 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 188, sec. 269, effective July 15, 1980. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 100. -- Amended 1952 Ky. Acts ch. 183, sec. 1. -- Created 1950 Ky. Acts ch. 206, sec. 1.
